Description:
Roles:We are seeking a skilled and experienced Facilities Manager to oversee the maintenance and operation of our facilities. As the Facilities Manager, you will be responsible for ensuring the efficient and effective functioning of our physical infrastructure, including buildings, equipment, and systems. You will lead a team of professionals and collaborate with various departments to ensure a safe, comfortable, and well-maintained work environment.Responsibilities:Develop and implement facilities management strategies, policies, and procedures to optimize the use of company resources and enhance productivity.
Oversee the maintenance, repair, and renovation of buildings, equipment, and systems, ensuring compliance with safety regulations and industry standards.
Conduct regular inspections of facilities and systems to identify maintenance needs, safety hazards, and operational inefficiencies.
Develop and manage budgets for facility operations, maintenance, and capital projects.
Negotiate and manage contracts with vendors, suppliers, and service providers to ensure cost-effective and high-quality services.
Lead and supervise a team of facilities management staff, including hiring, training, and performance management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and department heads to understand their facility-related needs and provide solutions and support.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in facilities management, engineering, business administration, or a related field.
Proven experience in facilities management, preferably in a managerial or supervisory role.
Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and develop a high-performing team.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with individuals at all levels of the organization.
